What to Wear in San Francisco Today

Current Weather:
Temperature: 65°F (18°C)  
Conditions: Partly cloudy
Wind: 10 mph

Recommended Clothing:
- Wear a long sleeve shirt or light jacket
- Pants or long skirts are best 
- Closed-toe shoes like sneakers or loafers
- Bring a light extra layer like a sweater in case it gets chilly, especially once the sun goes down

With the mild temperature and partly cloudy skies, a light long sleeve layer with pants and comfortable shoes is ideal. The light wind may make it feel a bit cooler. Having an extra layer on hand is recommended in case the clouds increase or the wind picks up later in the day. Overall, dressing in light layers that you can easily add or remove is the way to go for San Francisco's changeable weather today.
